gov.usgs.anss.util

Class JDBConnectionOld

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.util.JDBConnectionOld

  • public final class JDBConnectionOld
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a static holder for JDBC connections to the MySQL database. Connections are accessed by keys, which are just Strings. Some methods do not take a key; they act as if null were provided as the key.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String driver, java.lang.String url)
      Create a connection from a driver and a URL and make it the default connection.
      JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String driver, java.lang.String url, java.lang.String name)
      Create a connection from a driver and a URL and associate it with name, closing any previous connection associated with name.
      JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String catalog, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
      Create a connection with the specified host, catalog, user, and password and make it the default connection.
      JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String catalog, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password, boolean useSSL)
      Create a connection with the specified host, catalog, user, and password and make it the default connection.
      JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String catalog, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password, boolean useSSL, java.lang.String name)
      Create a connection with the specified host, catalog, user, and password and make it the default connection.
      JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String catalog, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password, boolean useSSL, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String vend)
      Create a connection with the specified host, catalog, user, and password and make it the default connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JDBConnectionOld

        public JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String host,
                        java.lang.String catalog,
                        java.lang.String user,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        boolean useSSL)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Create a connection with the specified host, catalog, user, and password and make it the default connection. If useSSL is true, have the connection use SSL.
        Parameters:
        host - the host name of the server to connect to
        catalog - the catalog to use once connected. If null, don't connect to any particular catalog
        user - the user name to use when connecting
        password - the password to use when connecting
        useSSL - if true, use SSL
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - usually network or database is down

      • JDBConnectionOld

        public JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String host,
                        java.lang.String catalog,

                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Create a connection with the specified host, catalog, user, and password and make it the default connection. If useSSL is true, have the connection use SSL.
        Parameters:
        host - the host name of the server to connect to
        catalog - the catalog to use once connected. If null, don't connect to any particular catalog
        user - the user name to use when connecting
        password - the password to use when connecting
        useSSL - if true, use SSL
        name - The name of this thread
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - usually network or database is down

      • JDBConnectionOld

        public JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String host,
                        java.lang.String catalog,
                        java.lang.String user,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        boolean useSSL,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String vend)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Create a connection with the specified host, catalog, user, and password and make it the default connection. If useSSL is true, have the connection use SSL.
        Parameters:
        host - the host name of the server to connect to
        catalog - the catalog to use once connected. If null, don't connect to any particular catalog
        user - the user name to use when connecting
        password - the password to use when connecting
        useSSL - if true, use SSL
        name - String name of tag to associate with this connection
        vend - If blank, mysql, else use oracle, postgres, etc.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - usually network or database is down

      • JDBConnectionOld

        public JDBConnectionOld(java.lang.String driver,
                        java.lang.String url,
                        java.lang.String name)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Create a connection from a driver and a URL and associate it with name, closing any previous connection associated with name.
        Parameters:
        driver - String with the driver to use
        url - String with the connection information to use
        name - the name under which to register the connection
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Usually network or database is down
